pages.text: Gallant used to be a fishing boat until it was boarded by a group of pirates, who slaughtered the original crew. They ended up taking over the ship, installing 6 cannons and new sails. They've kept the large fishing net at the back, although the reason for this is unclear.
pages.title: Description

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/salvo)$(l)Salvo/$$(br)Gallant's cannons fire at a $(l)line of 5 tiles, damaging all of them/$. This ability has $(l)2 Uses/$ and costs $(l)8 Energy/$ to use.
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/torpedo_net)$(l)Protective Net/$$(br)The fishing net at the back $(l)protects 9 tiles in a row from $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/torpedo)torpedoes/$.
pages.title: Passive Ability
